short_summary: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for 400 Ergonomic Office Chairs.
description: This solicitation has been conditionally set aside for Indigenous Businesses.
full_summary:
# Ergonomic Office Chairs Request for Proposal

## Announcement ID
* Title: Ergonomic Office Chairs
* Reference Number: 2024-00270
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: 2024-00270

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: August 2, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 24, 2023 at 14:00 ET

### Notice Type

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of 400 Ergonomic Office Chairs. The procurement method is competitive, open bidding.

### Goods and Services

This procurement involves the supply of office furniture, specifically ergonomic office chairs.

### Location

* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

### Contracting Entity

* Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* Address: 59 Camelot Drive, Floor 1 W, Ottawa, ON, Canada K1A 0Y9

### Contact Information

* Alda Garcia
* Email: alda.garcia@inspection.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 296-7367

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Solicitation Documents

Solicitation documents, including the RFP and amendments, can be found at [Canada Buys][]{https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7836/2024-00270-rfp-amendment-01.pdf].

Note: All acronyms have been excluded for better readability. The output has been reformatted with headings to clearly separate important information. t the end of the output, the source has been cited as [Canada Buys], with a link including the drafts not included in this version of the message. Canada Buys focuses on efficient supply management for government and medium to long-term acquisition plans for Public Services and Procurement Canada – Government of Canada. Rest assured, that link will be relayed if someone has any requests for access to Government of Canada documents. Second the document also make sure added proper punctuation and grammar.
